name: Candy/Ketto
description:
Oh no! After a long flight, Santa's sleigh has crashed. Santa and all his reindeer are gone. All that's left are you and some of your friends...

You found a present with your name on it and - Wow! Santa got you the Candy Cane-Katana Set you've wished for! So, you and your friends decide to test them out.

OBJECTIVE

Gather gifts from the middle, and bring them to your tree (the green one)!

Take out the enemy elf clan if you need to... When the timer ends, the team with the highest score wins.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

Mouse - Choose Block/Attack Direction

LMB - Attack

RMB - Block

E (Hold) - Use/Pick Up Present

F  - Holster/Draw Weapon

SPECIAL THANKS to Firith Studio for hosting this Game Jam, and everyone who plays our game!

CREDITS

-Programming, Sound Engineering and Music Composition

Hjalti Hlöðversson

-3D assets, Textures, Animation, Rigging

Hafliði Hlöðversson

-Voice Acting, Morale Support

Sandy Mariah

-Extra 3D assets (Sleigh and Gifts) from Unity Asset Store

Theme Song can be found here on Hjalti's SoundCloud
